title: CCK Podcast: Kill Floor Paper Chaser (featuring Charles Oakley)
description:
Legendary New York Knick Charles Oakley joins at the top of the show to confirm his criticism of Patrick Ewing and the tension with James Dolan. Tom Arnold takes a shot at the boss, Kowloon is undergoing a transformation, and do Blake Snell's comments mean the end of baseball in 2020?


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
